title: 20242 and Council Regulation (EU) 2024/1856 of 28 June 20243), and effect to
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Sea-Fisheries (Quotas)
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Sea-Fisheries (Quotas) 

(Amendment) Regulations 2024.

title: 20242 and Council Regulation (EU) 2024/1856 of 28 June 20243), and effect to
heading: 2. The Sea-Fisheries (Quotas) Regulation 2024 (S.I. No. 457 of 2024) are
text_raw:
2. The Sea-Fisheries (Quotas) Regulation 2024 (S.I. No. 457 of 2024) are 
amended in Regulation 2(1) by the insertion after “28 June 2024” in the 
definition of “Council Regulation” of the following: “and Council Regulation 
(EU) 2024/2678 of 10 October 2024”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

4 December, 2024. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

1 OJ L 2024/257, 11.01.2024. 
2 OJ L 2024/1015, 27.03.2024. 
3 OJ L 2024/1856, 01.07.2024. 
4 OJ L 2024/2678, 11.10.2024. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 6th December, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [679] 3

title: 20242 and Council Regulation (EU) 2024/1856 of 28 June 20243), and effect to
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This instrument amends the Sea-Fisheries (Quotas) Regulation 2024 (S.I. No. 
457 of 2024) to give effect to Council Regulation (EU) 2024/2678 of 10 October 
2024 amending Regulation (EU) 2024/257 fixing for 2024, 2025 and 2026 the 
fishing opportunities for certain fish stocks, applicable in Union waters and, for 
Union fishing vessels, in certain non-Union waters, and amending Regulation 
(EU) 2023/194 fixing for 2023 and 2024 such fishing opportunities. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [679]
